17g PROTEIN
Keto

KETO PROTEIN BALLS

Low-carb keto-friendly protein balls with only 4g net carbs. 17g protein per serving.

17g
Protein
160
Calories
12m
Total Time
18
Yield

Nutrition per 2 balls

Carbs6g
Fat12g
Fiber2g
Sugar1g
DifficultyEasy

INGREDIENTS

  • 120g almond flour
  • 60g vanilla whey protein powder
  • 128g almond butter
  • 60g sugar-free sweetener
  • 30g unsweetened coconut flakes
  • 30ml coconut oil, melted

INSTRUCTIONS

1

Mix Dry

Combine almond flour, protein powder, and sweetener.

2

Add Wet

Stir in almond butter and coconut oil.

3

Add Coconut

Fold in coconut flakes.

4

Roll

Form 18 balls.

5

Chill

Refrigerate 1 hour.

PRO TIPS

ðŸ’¡

Store in an airtight container at room temperature for up to 5 days.

ðŸ’¡

For best results, use a kitchen scale to measure ingredients in grams.

ðŸ’¡

Let cool completely before storing to prevent sogginess.
